messages.subject: Re: chat with Ren in progress
messages.msgSnippet: It WAS fun!  Snappy to keep up with, but fun to feel virtually like in the room with y all.  cindy ... Allen
messages.messageBody:
It WAS fun! Snappy to keep up with, but fun to feel virtually like
in the room with y'all.

<G>

cindy

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: chat with Ren in progress
messages.msgSnippet: The chat with me is on Wednesday at 11am CST (it s 5pm Greenwich Mean Time). There is a list now if you want to know when chats are coming up:
messages.messageBody:
The chat with me is on Wednesday at 11am CST (it's 5pm Greenwich Mean Time). There is a list now if you want to know when chats are coming up: http://groups.yahoo.com/group/ChatNote/

I've really enjoyed the rush of real time chats. It was good to watch Ren chat. I'd just listened to the interview that Ren and Laura Bowman had done on the Relaxed Homeschooler, so I had their voices still in my head.

Schuyler




________________________________

To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, 13 February, 2009 12:07:14 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: chat with Ren in progress

right now, http://sandradodd.com/room the password is goodidea.

That was a lot of fun today! I hope some of you will make IDs at the
chat room and join Sandra for the chat with Schuyler next week.
There's one on Monday and then Schuyler is on Thursday (is that
right?). The focus is video gaming and I believe she's getting my
friend Laura scheduled for a chat about being new to unschooling.
Lotsa fun!

Ren

I was sad to have missed it. It was over by the time I got my people
settled.

I hope to try again next week,
Faith
